review: Fantastic device. I heard this was easy to set up and use and it was even easier than imagined. Anyone connected with an Android or Apple device to the same wi fi network can stream to it with no setup. I also have a Roku, a great device in it's own right, but I find I never use it now because the Chromecast is so much easier and faster to use. Picture quality is also outstanding.

review: This is a decent streaming stick. It hooks to the back of your tv in your HDMI port and streams stuff from all your devices - laptop, computer, cell phone, and tablet. It takes a bit of getting used to but you can watch videos on youtube, netflix, etc. It also has other extensions that allow you to view other media like music and movies. It's pretty comparable to the roku streaming stick but with the chromecast, you use your device as your remote (ie. phone, tablet, laptop).
